snippet.title: Game Boy Longplay [025] Ninja Gaiden Shadow
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: schdephy

While playing through this game, childhood memories returned as it has always been one of my favorite Game Boy titles (by the way: with great music!). "Ninja Gaiden Shadow" (in Europe "Shadow Warriors") was first thought to be a porting of "Shadow of the Ninja" for the NES. Tecmo received the rights from Natsume and supplemented the game with the typical characters of the Ninja-Gaiden-series: The bad guy Garuda haunts the people in New York City and only 16-year-old Ninja Ryu Hayabusa can stop him.
Some words about my playing: I think this is the easiest "Ninja Gaiden" game and you can beat it without losing a life point. Although I didn't made a perfect run, I hope you'll like it anyway. -
